forOrganisers.title: For promoters
forOrganisers.1: Do you have an upcoming event, workshop or a course that is on the Improbox line up?
forOrganisers.2: Are looking for a new actors, an interim help or other need for new people?
forOrganisers.3: Would you like to get help to promote your event?

text.introLine1: What, when, where in Czech world of improv comedy.
text.introLineKosile: This is a non profit website. Support further updates and the author by purchasing a premium, czech handmade shirt on <1>košile Od Uhlíře</1>, which myself as author, I'm making.
text.mailButton: I want to subscribe for new events and updates
text.madeBy: This web was created by <1>Vojtěch Uhlíř</1>, an improv actor and a software engineer.
text.alsoMade: Do you x-country ski during the winter? Check out <1>www.prispevkynabezky.cz</1>! Web that makes donation for x-country ski trails maintance easy I also made.
text.footerLine2: Is there something wrong or missing?
text.footerLine3: Write us and get in touch! ✍️
